Source.Name: perl-test-fatal
Source.Summary: Test::Fatal incredibly simple helpers for testing code with exceptions
Source.Description: Test::Fatal is an alternative to the popular Test::Exception. It does much less, but should allow greater flexibility in testing exception-throwing code with about the same amount of typing.
